Author: CloudySideDown
Text: Still a valid ED. But I want to stress the valid ED part. With or without the ED you are still a valid and wonderful person.

Author: Savikitty
Text: It's normal to feel like an imposter, or like you aren't sick enough. I almost feels like that's part of having an ED.   I have a high BMR and I restrict to 1000-1200 per day. I still have an ED and I don't think it's invalid. I obsess over food, calories, my body, and my weight. Food controls my life basically, I rarely let myself eat enough and it sucksssss.   I'm sorry about your dad btw. ðŸ˜Ÿ
